thread.title: Store surveillance video: bottle in purse, then a dance
thread.title_full: Store surveillance video: bottle in purse, then a dance - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Store surveillance video: bottle in purse, then a dance
text:
D'IBERVILLE, Miss. (AP) - The owner of a D'Iberville (dee-EYE-ber-vil) liquor store has asked for help identifying a woman shown on surveillance video dancing after apparently stealing a bottle, and a man putting a bottle or two down his pants.
WLOX-TV ( http://bit.ly/1R5Sqwt ) reports that one video taken Oct. 8 shows the woman apparently putting a bottle in her purse, then doing a popular dance. Another shows her with a man who's apparently putting a white bottle or two down his pants.
The store's Facebook page also has a still shot of the two facing the camera together.
A post on Sunday showed a police car in front of the store. The note with it thanks Facebook users for likes and shares, and adds that D'Iberville police "will be taking care of this matter."
Online: http://on.fb.me/1WVfbqG
Information from: WLOX-TV, http://www.wlox.com
